nodes.text: Dxun was one of the four moons of the planet Onderon, located in the Japrael system of the Inner Rim's Japrael sector. The moon was situated at grid square O-9 on the Standard Galactic Grid.

Dxun was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the fifty-seventh issue of De Agostini's Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around February 3, 2016. The moon first appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in Tales of the Jedi 1, the first issue of the Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi miniseries authored by Tom Veitch and published in 1993.
